decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - 1.	The advertisement hereby permitted is granted for 12 months from the date of this decision.  It shall only be displayed while works required to refurbish the premises are being undertaken.  Thereafter the proposed advert shall be removed along with any associated equipment from the building
Condition : 2 - 2.	The advertisement hereby approved shall not be internally or externally illuminated

Condition : 3 - 3.	The display panel shall be restricted to the images as shown within the document labelled PY2241/004 without external lighting, PY2241/005 without external lighting, PY2241/007 without external lighting received on the 01.07.2015 and email confirming no external lighting received on the 01.10.2015  and for no other advertisements unless otherwise agreed with the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 4 - No advertisement is to be displayed without the permission of the owner of the site or any other person with an interest in the site entitled to grant permission

Condition : 5 - No advertisement shall be sited or displayed so as to-
(a) endanger persons using any public highway, railway, waterway, dock, harbour or aerodrome (civil or military);
(b) obscure, or hinder the ready interpretation of, any traffic sign, railway signal or aid to navigation by water or air; or
(c) hinder the operation of any device used for the purpose of security or surveillance or for measuring the speed of any vehicle.
Condition : 6 - Any advertisement displayed, and any site used for the display of advertisments, shall be maintained in a condition that does not impair the visual amenity of the site
Condition : 7 - Any structure or hoarding erected and used principally for the purpose of displaying advertisements shall be maintained in a condition that does not endanger the public
Condition : 8 - Where an advertisement is required under these Regulations to be removed, the site shall be left in a condition that does not endanger the public or impair visual amenity
description: Installation of scaffold screen advertisement for a period 12 months
